about_the_game:
What is Sunshine Love about?

“Sunshine Love”, is a first/third-person choice-based visual novel. The game has now been completed, and all three chapters are available to play and finish! Scroll down the page to find out how you can play Sunshine Love.

Main plot (Chapter 3)

This is it, the final couple of weeks for you in Sunshine Bay.

There will be a lot of tough decisions to make, friends to say goodbye to and hearts that you will potentially break.

 

And just as importantly, it’s the last chance for you to help your childhood friend save her hotel before you leave town. It was the main reason why she asked you to see her.

 

In Chapter 3, you will be put into some life-threatening situations that you will have to navigate your way through, while also keeping an eye on your respective relationships

and trying not to screw things up in the process.

 

There will be plenty of game ending possibilities by the end of this final chapter.

Who do you want to be with is the main question and concern you will be burdened with.

 

And what if you are in love with more than one girl?

Does that complicate things for you, or can you think of another way where you can make it work?

 

And what about Nicole (if you are still seeing her)?

Are you happy to return home to her or will you be left with some regrets?

 

During this final chapter, you will have to make some decisions between two or more options, that will negatively or positively affect the outcome of your relationships with other people and the main story as well.

Some decisions may offer you the option to continue your relationship with certain characters, or end them for good.

And these decisions can be the difference between you getting one game ending or another.

 

Your time in Sunshine Bay is about to come to end (or is it?)

Make sure you end things on the best possible note, no matter how things end or whom with…

content_descriptors.notes:
Sunshine Love is a game intended for adults only and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are all fictitious. 
All characters are depicted as 18 and over. Contains incest, nudity, consensual sex, alternative lifestyles, usage of alcohol, graphic depictions of oral, vaginal, anal, and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.

This content can be disabled in the game.

name: Sunshine Love Chapter 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: “Sunshine Love”, is a first/third-person choice-based visual novel about romance and drama. Chapter 3 is the final part of your adventure in Sunshine Bay.
